participant_1.background:
I love the freedom of driving my moped around town.
I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.

participant_2.background:
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.
i play basketball.
My ideal home would have a yard big enough for my dog and cat to run around in.
I don't know much about my parents.
i am a widow.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
Hi, I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you today?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm excited to meet you.
Me too! I'm happy to meet you as well.
I see that you like to drive and dress up. Do you have any favorite places to drive to?
I love to drive around the city, especially at night. I love the lights and the energy.
That sounds like fun! I love to drive around my rural area, it's so peaceful.
I used to live in a rural area, I miss it sometimes.
Why did you move away?
I had to move to be closer to my family.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad you're able to be close to your family now.
Thanks, me too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to play basketball, and I love to spend time with my dog.
That sounds great! I love to play basketball too.
What position do you play?
I'm a point guard.
Nice! I'm a shooting guard.
Cool! We should play sometime.
That would be fun
